data.title: 2019 Publications: Department of Pediatrics
data.text:
Listed below are the 2019 publications from faculty of the Department of Pediatrics.

In 2019, the Department of Pediatrics Faculty had 127 peer-reviewed journal article publications along with 31 posters at local and national meetings and 7 book chapters.

Allergy and Immunology

Pooja Varshney, MD

Neupert K, Cherian S, Varshney P. Epinephrine use in Austin Independent School District after implementation of unassigned epinephrine. J Allergy Clin Immunol Pract. 2019 May - Jun;7(5):1650-1652.e4.
